data.price: بەزى كىشىلەر: «پەرۋەردىگارىمىز! بىزگە دۇنيادا ياخشىلىق ئاتا قىلغىن، ئاخىرەتتىمۇ ياخشىلىق ئاتا قىلغىن، بىزنى دوزاخ ئازابىدىن ساقلىغىن» دەيدۇ[201].
data.arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَقُولُ رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِنَا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗ وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ حَسَنَةٗ وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yaqūlu rabbanā ātinā fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wafī al-ākhirati ḥasanatan waqinā ʿadhāba al-nāri

dua.name: Dua for Holistic Well-being
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine blessings for comprehensive well-being in both worldly and spiritual dimensions.

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
